div.div: This search form uses an instant search feature. As you type, search results will appear automatically below the search field. When you've entered you desired search terms use tab to navigate through the available results and hit enter to open the selected page or document.

h2.br: Building on a Strong Foundation for Continued Success!

div.p: Class of 2020 - Be sure to check your email for the invite to the Google Classroom for end of the year items. This includes pick up of cap & gown tomorrow! PupNation please stay safe with the threat of weather tonight and keep an eye out for our inaugural Trivia night this week. view image
May 1 virtual signing day!!! view image

Just a reminder that surveys for cycle 2 are not available. Follow this link to complete. We appreciate your continued support and feedback during these times! #PupNation http://caneyvalleyks.apptegy.us/o/caney-valley-usd-436/page/surveys-for-continuous-learning
